Class StemmerHandler

  • org.livingdoc.engine.execution.examples.scenarios.matching.StemmerHandler

  • public class StemmerHandler

    entry point to Stemmer Algorithm, refactoring not recommended, algorithm is stable and commonly used initialisation point is adapted to match the RegMatching

    suppress annotation is needed.
